meanings.definition: A kitchen utensil used to mash cooked vegetables or fruits into a fine pulp.
meanings.sent1: My mom used the ricer to make smooth mashed potatoes for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef used the ricer to prepare the baby's food.
meanings.sent3: The ricer made the carrots look like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The ricer transformed the apples into a velvety puree.
meanings.sent5: The ricer turned the peas into a creamy paste.

meanings.definition: A person who modifies cars, typically Asian imports, to give them a sporty appearance.
meanings.sent1: The ricer added a spoiler to his car to make it look faster.
meanings.sent2: The group of ricers gathered at the car meet to show off their vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The ricer's car had so many modifications, it looked like a racing spaceship.
meanings.sent4: The ricer's car was a colorful canvas of speed and style.
meanings.sent5: The ricer's vehicle was a flashy display of automotive creativity.
